# index(after:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the position immediately after the given index.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func index(after i: Int) -> Int
```

## Parameters

- **i**: A valid index of the collection. Use a value less than [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Scene/AnchorCollection/endIndex].

## Return Value

The index value immediately after i.

## Manipulating indices

- **Scene.AnchorCollection.Index**: A type that represents a position in the collection.
- **Scene.AnchorCollection.Indices**: A type that represents the indices that are valid for subscripting the collection, in ascending order.
- **startIndex**: The position of the first element in a nonempty collection.
- **endIndex**: The position one greater than the last valid subscript argument.
